p: This project has been supported by the U.S. President's Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief (PEPFAR) through the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) under the terms of Cooperative Agreement 5U2GGH000324. Additional support was received through the UCSF‐Gladstone Institute of Virology & Immunology Center for AIDS Research (CFAR), an NIH‐funded programme (P30 AI027763). The CDC reviewed the protocol. Funders had no involvement in the data collection, interpretation, writing or the decision to submit a manuscript.
